attributes.action: schools supporting self harm and bullying
attributes.additional_details: School a place where young children and teenagers are ment to feel safe right?  Everyday more and more people are bullied and self harm.  School is a place of education but do schools put enough help and time into theese 2 problems?  Of course some schools have the facilities in place but more schools need the same level of standard and this is why I am here.  Schools require more help from the government in order for this happen please find the time to sign my petition thank you.
